00021 #include "mcvm.h"
00022 
00023 void mcvmPrint(ostream & o, CvMat * A, char * matrix_name)
00024 {
00025   if (A->cols == 1)
00026   {
00027     if (matrix_name != 0)
00028       o << matrix_name << " = [ ";
00029     else
00030       o << " [ ";
00031     for(int i = 0; i < A->rows; i++)
00032       o << cvmGet(A, i, 0) << "; ";
00033     o << "]^t" << endl;
00034     return;
00035   }
00036 
00037   if (matrix_name != 0)
00038     o << matrix_name << ":" << endl;
00039   for(int i = 0; i < A->rows; i++)
00040   {
00041     for(int j = 0; j < A->cols; j++)
00042       o << cvmGet(A, i, j) << " ";
00043     o << endl;
00044   }
00045 }
